text: Billy Butler (born April 18, 1986) is an American baseball player. He plays first base for the Kansas City Royals of Major League Baseball (MLB). The Royals chose Butler in the 2004 First-Year Player Draft. Butler had played baseball in high school in Jacksonville, Florida, and entered the draft instead of playing in college. He played his first MLB game on May 1, 2007. ==References== Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Billy Butler
